name: VONIMIR
description:
「VONIMIR 」is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels ,it combines the classic JRPG adventure story with the 2.5D combat experience.

We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, collect and develop business, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .
